Posts.Content: I was told on another site that I am HER2 Pos., ERÂ + 30% & PR Pos 20%, Grade 2, Tumor was 4.5 cm. Im am 38. I am waiting on the cancer treatment center to call to set up my initial appt. but the waiting is so stressfull. I would at least like to know what treatment I will possibly be looking at. I don't know what treatments I should be reading about.
Posts.Title: Need help figuring out what I might be looking at.
